climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: ECO DIAPERS THAT WORK: Gentle on your baby and their world—and they work. Made with 85 percent plant-based materials and a featherlike ultra-soft top sheet, Terra diapers are suitable for all skin types and dermatologically rated ‘Excellent’ by Dermatest.

PURE and GENTLE: 0 percent Chlorine, Fragrance, Latex, Parabens, Phthalates, Bleach and Other Harmful Chemicals. Plant-based wetness indicator with no chemicals. Unique 100 percent recyclable packaging, printed with same food-grade ink as on the products.

INSTANT DRYNESS: FSC Certified wood pulp and the highest quality Japanese SAP provide unmatched absorption. Quick drying top sheet helps prevent diaper rash and means less diaper changes and less diapers used. Better for the environment and your budget.

LEAKS STOP HERE: Unique 360 degree Absorb-Pad increases absorbency area for instant dryness with 3D leak guards to prevent leaks and side spills. Perfect for nighttime as an overnight diaper to minimize wake-ups without needing an extra diaper booster pad.
Available in a 20 pack or a case of 160 diapers, our Size 3 diapers offer unbeatable performance with honest clean ingredients that don’t compromise functionality. Designed for babies 13-24 pounds.
body.description: Terra makes products that are better for your baby, and their world, without compromising functionality! Terra plant-based diapers and bamboo baby wipes are the real deal – they perform like you need them to – and are better for the environment. Terra Diapers are 85% plant-based, which is as much plant-based material as we can currently use without sacrificing performance. Our diapers are designed with ultra-soft materials and a gentle, hypoallergenic liner that's free of harmful chemicals, making them safe and gentle for even the most sensitive skin. Our diapers provide a snug fit and reliable leak protection to keep your baby dry and comfortable, even overnight. The unique 360˚ Absorb Pad increases the absorbency area for instant dryness and 3D leak guards prevent leaks and side spills. Within 60 seconds of wetting, the diaper top sheet is dry to the touch, meaning you don’t have to change your little one as often because they’re dry! Even the wetness indicator is plant-based. When you choose Terra, you're not only making a choice that's safe for your baby, but you're also making a choice that's better for the planet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NEW Terra Diapers Beat the Competition for Absorbency & Dryness! Diaper Absorbency Test: Which Diaper Absorbs the Most AND Stays Dry? Babies' skin is extremely sensitive, up to 5x thinner than adults & much more absorbent. They'll spend almost all day every day in a diaper, so we understand the importance of being transparent about our ingredients & the quality of our products. A lot goes into a good diaper! We've seen other diaper brands pour liquid in a diaper and show that the liquid doesn't leak out, but what about the inside where it touches your baby? You want a diaper that doesn't leak AND keeps your baby dry! We've also seen other brands perform tests where it's clear they don't put the same amount of pressure on their diaper to make it look better! We tested a Terra plant-based diaper against two other popular diaper brands to see which one absorbs the most liquid, AND which one stays the most dry. We used a 5 lb. weight so there's no way to fudge the results. Honestly, the video speaks for itself—scroll to the top and click through all the images to see the video!

Features of Terra Plant-Based Diapers Gentle on your Baby and Their World Made with 85% Plant-Based Materials0% Chlorine, Fragrance, Latex, Parabens, Phthalates or BleachBreathable back sheet made with 100% bio-degradable bamboo fiber, NOT bamboo from ViscosePlant-Based Wetness Indicator to show how much the diaper has absorbed without using chemicalsFood-Safe Ink ONLY on product & packaging. Fewer Diapers, Greater Impact Terra Diapers offer 12+ hours of breathable dryness and protection against diaper rash--great as overnight diapers. Because Terra diapers are so absorbent, and provide instant dryness, you can use less diapers which is better for your baby and their world! Try Terra 100% Bamboo Baby Wipes So strong but so fresh. The natural ingredients in Terra bamboo baby wipes have been carefully selected to help even the most sensitive skin stay nourished and moisturized while protecting against rash and irritation. Made from 100% FSC-Certified Bamboo (NOT from Viscose) and 99.7% Pure NZ Water. 0% Plastic, Chemicals, Fragrance, Optical Brighteners or Other Harsh Chemicals.

Terra Diaper Size Chart We are on a journey! By choosing Terra, you can be proud that you are choosing products that not only care for those dearest to you but also care for the Earth as our journey towards a more sustainable future sits at the core of Terra ethos.

Amazon Baby Registry Essentials & New Parent Must-Haves We know it's overwhelming finding the best products for your baby. Let us help! From the best diaper pails to teething essentials and innovative baby gates to must-have stroller accessories for baby number two, Amazon has it all! Check out these top baby brands to learn about the latest baby registry essentials and new-parent necessities.

Best Diaper Pails Innovative Baby Proofing Teething Essentials Bathing Favorites Stroller Accessories Safe & Stylish Baby Gates Why You'll Love It: You’ll change 6,000-9,000 diapers before your child is potty trained! We found a much simpler way to dispose of them! Step. Drop. Done. The children’s home safety market has seen very little innovation for decades. Check out these innovative baby safety products. Help soothe your little one's teething pain at the source, with fun, flexible baby teethers that are perfect for tiny hands to grip. Little faces will light up as wobblers bob, rocks slide & boats sail through foamy tubs. Having another baby? Don't get a bulky double stroller, get a BuggyBoard! The universal fit works on 95% of strollers on the market & makes traveling fun with 2 little ones! Baby proofing doesn’t have to be ugly! These innovative baby safety gates make your home safer and complement your decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for nighttime!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter would was waking up with wet onesies every morning and her diapers were the correct size. I was looking for overnight diapers and I'm so glad I came across these! Yes, they are pricey but soo worth it! The diapers are so soft and luxurious! You can immediately tell they're high quality! I will use these until I can't anymore! My girl drinks a lot and pees a lot during the night, not one wet onesie at all! These are so thick and hold so much liquid. I had honestly never heard of this brand before but I'm so glad I found them. Non-toxic, organic, fragrance free diapers are so limited and this is everything I didn't know I needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 5 month old so that she could comfortably sleep through the night without waking up wet. I really love these!! Hard to say if the little redness I see is from the diaper itself or just it being on her from 7pm-7am. They are SUPER absorbent - heavy when she wakes up but not wet at all. Seems very moisture-wicking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great absorbency and so soft compared to others on the market
reviews.reviewText: I tried these when my regular diapers were out of stock (Nest diapers). I had never heard of this brand but I gave them a try and I’m so glad I did! They are thick, soft, and have so much more flexibility than so many others I’ve tried. True to size too. The only reason I’m not giving them 5 stars is because twice now my daughter has leaked through them by morning. But, she feeds so much at night too. Will be making these my new go-to diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these diapers!
reviews.reviewText: We were plagued by night leaks every day in every other kind of non toxic diaper, until we found these. We size up and she’s just at the bottom of the weight range but she hasn’t leaked since using these! I felt so bad she would wake up wet every morning and I was having to change her sleep sack and sheets every day so these diapers have been a game changer. We’ve also started wearing her true size during the day and it’s kind of amazing how dry the diaper is even when it’s relatively full. They are pretty thick but that’s honestly a nice change from the paper f thin diapers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great quality but very thick!
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like these diapers I got 2 different sizes (5 and 6) but they are super thick my 20 month old was very uncomfortable throughout the day…they were very soft and didn’t have a smell to them. Maybe they are more night diapers but they were just wayy to thick for mine and my baby’s liking I will not be purchasing these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and sustainable
reviews.reviewText: Personally we haven't experienced any more leaks than I have with any of the name brand diapers. I do have to pull them way up to the belly button. And that helps. We are using size 3, and they are soft and I don't see any redness on the little one. I love the sustainability factor as well as the packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these for nighttime
reviews.reviewText: Love these for night time. My baby typically will go through 5 diapers of Honest or Pampers in a night and stirs. I got these and they hold way more and he can go through a longer stretch and they keep the moisture away from the skin a lot better too. No gross smells. I use 3 a night at this time as he is a newborn. ****They do run large so they would be big on a newborn.. my baby is 9.5 lbs now and they fit perfect with some room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Tabs don't hold!
reviews.reviewText: Super soft, thick and absorbent....BUT the tabs are too short and will lift. Thought is was a one off when my child woke up soaking wet, clothes and bed. The diaper tab had lifted and got stuck to the inside of my child's onsie. Then it happened again and again. Now I can hear the velcro sound when my child is crawling and I know the diaper is coming off. It's hard to keep your little one dry when the diaper won't stay on! I wanted to love these diapers. Disappointed.

I really wanted to like these diapers as they are one of the most accessible "non-toxic" diapers in Canada. They also feel incredibly luxurious and soft. However the first night I put my 4 month old in the size 3 (he is 16lbs) I had to change him in the middle of the night ! The diaper fit properly and the leakage did not happen from the legs. The actual diaper itself had soaked through so much that when I put it on the table it left a wet mark. He sleeps roughly 8-10 hours at night and I have never experienced this with the pampers pure diapers. I'm hoping to have more success with ecopea or ecoriginal diapers (Both of which are difficult to get in Canada). Very disappointed given these diapers are nearly 1.00 per diaper! I gave it a 3/5 star because they hold smaller pees during the day well. Unfortunately a wet breastmilk poop will saturate them too :(
